author: ianna
body:
#### PR description:

* Use DD4hep `Filter` and `SpecParRegistry`, remove local copies. 

@cvuosalo - this is a second step in cleaning up `DetectorDescription/DDCMS `

@mrodozov - this PR will help you to reproduce the missing symbols problem. <strike>It's done for `DetectorDescription/DDCMS` package only.</strike>

title: [DD4hep] Migrate to a new version of DD4hep
